title: Dinnerbone: OSX的新版本启动器已经发布
author: simon3000
txt_content:
退微软保平安

不用微软不微软
用了Mac就Max

replies.author: pca006132
replies.txt_content:
标题: Dinnerbone: OSX的新版本启动器已经发布 本帖最后由 cyqsimon 于 2015-9-12 13:58 编辑 
OSX Minecraft players: We've released the new launcher for OSX 10.8 and above :) It's much faster than the old one. https://launcher.mojang.com/download/Minecraft.dmg …
OSX系统的minecraft玩家:我们已经发布了新启动器给OSX 版本10.8或以上的玩家:) 这个比旧的那个快很多
链接：https://t.co/C8kKi2ikAT

We can't auto update from the current java one to the new one, so you'll have to update it manually unfortunately :(
我们不能自动把现在那个Java的更新到新的启动器，所以很不幸你需要人手去更新:(

推文链接：https://twitter.com/Dinnerbone/status/642340216636882944 及 https://twitter.com/Dinnerbone/status/642340921409994752
